version_description:
Fixes constant crashing on iPhone 6
Increased performance on lower end devices
Misc Bug Fixes
Misc Performance enhancements

-Dispensary Stuck bug fixed
-“Slap!” quests now progresses correctly
-Golden Pot now available
-Various bug fixes
-Various performance enhancements

- Karma Events added!!!
- Dispensary and bubblegum plant bugs fixed!
- Increased level cap to 35
- New and modified quest rewards, achievements and level rewards
- Sweeping balance adjustments across entire game
- Performance improvements and bug fixes

- AD FIX - Ad Animal will now dismiss properly and provide consistent rewards.
- Smoothed out Karma Event reward flow.
- AD button is no longer a weed strain icon.
- Various performance fixes.
- Various bug fixes.

-Dispensary Stuck bug fixed
-“Slap!” quests now progresses correctly
-Golden Pot now available
-Various bug fixes
-Various performance enhancements

Content Load Error bug fixed
Misc. balance changes
Misc. bug fixes

Fixes constant crashing on iPhone 6
Increased performance on lower end devices
Misc Bug Fixes
Misc Performance enhancements
